channel.title: Sophie Walker / @SophieRunning
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @SophieRunning. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title:
RT by @SophieRunning: In the end it wasn't the "powerful" men, it was a young girl who stood before the world and took an oath.
I'm not the least bit surprised.
item.dc:creator: @ErinBrockovich
item.description:
In the end it wasn't the "powerful" men, it was a young girl who stood before the world and took an oath.

item.title: RT by @SophieRunning: I named the tables in my class Barbara, Kenneth, Alan & Gloria, mainly for my own amusement. Today I said Barbara could go & line up first. One kid shouted out ‚ÄòBecause we‚Äôre Babulous!‚Äô. My work here is done.

item.title: This is so dreadfully sad. What a light she shone, what a bright, bright smile and what campaigning energy right to the end. Condolences to all family and friends of @bowelbabe for such a loss.

item.title: If Barack Obama couldn‚Äôt be bothered to ensure women‚Äôs abortion rights were fully secure, how safe do you think they are with Boris Johnson? Organise, organise, organise. Resist, resist, resist. #RoeVsWade #abortionrights #mybodymychoice

item.description:
If Barack Obama couldn‚Äôt be bothered to ensure women‚Äôs abortion rights were fully secure, how safe do you think they are with Boris Johnson? Organise, organise, organise.
Resist, resist, resist.
#RoeVsWade #abortionrights #mybodymychoice

item.title:
RT by @SophieRunning: The @metpoliceuk say women should be ‚Äúalert but not alarmed‚Äù after Zara Aleena was beaten to death by a stranger in a random attack yesterday morning.
The police can kindly do one. This is alarming. Telling women how we should feel is insulting.

item.title: RT by @SophieRunning: We are not powerless. Here‚Äôs what I‚Äôm fighting for: Expanding our Senate majority so we can eliminate the filibuster & codify Roe. Expanding the Supreme Court to rebalance this institution. Defending abortion rights in states through ballot measures and downballot elections.
item.dc:creator: @ewarren
item.description: We are not powerless. Here‚Äôs what I‚Äôm fighting for: Expanding our Senate majority so we can eliminate the filibuster & codify Roe. Expanding the Supreme Court to rebalance this institution. Defending abortion rights in states through ballot measures and downballot elections.
